TEXT.TITLE: CBS <CBS> PURCHASES NEW GAME SHOW
TEXT.BODY: <Ralph Andrews Productions> and <CCR Productions> said their new game show, "Lingo", was purchased for the fall season by CBS Inc for broadcast on its O and O network. The show will be hosted by Michael Reagan, son of President Reagan by his marriage to Jane Wyman, the production companies said. Reuter
